title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: During text change with word wrap, the StyledText component is redrawing more frequently than necessary.
EB: This should only result in a maximum of one redraw for each visible line.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow the steps below:
1. Open the application with the StyledText component.
2. Enable word wrap in the StyledText component.
3. Make a text change that causes the word wrap to occur.
4. Observe the number of redraws that are triggered during the text change.
